about.label: About
about.title: About Me
about.description: Meet Bobby Stearns, Executive Chef from Kansas City

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Bobby Stearns is an Executive Chef known for his creative approach to cooking and his commitment to using fresh, locally-sourced ingredients. With years of experience in fine dining, Bobby aims to create memorable culinary experiences for every guest.

Ophelia's Restruant.achievements: Redefined the menu, introducing seasonal dishes that increased customer satisfaction scores by 30%.;Trained a team of chefs, enhancing kitchen efficiency and reducing food waste by 15%.

Culinary Institute of America.description: Earned a degree in Culinary Arts, specializing in fine dining.

Johnson County Community College.description: Studied Hospitality Management, focusing on restaurant operations.

Gastronomy.description: Expert in modern gastronomy techniques and flavor pairings.

Food Presentation.description: Skilled in creating visually stunning dishes that engage the senses.

Menu Development.description: Proficient in crafting seasonal menus that highlight local ingredients.
